name: Emerging Symbols
tagline: Crossing the symbolic threshold with deep neural nets
body:
# emergingsymbols
Java code used for language training experiments with deep neural networks. This research was modeled after Savage-Rumbaugh's research on chimpanzees crossing the symbolic threshold. It shows the advantages in (terms of learning) of using semiotic symbols over pure indexical (i.e. associative) signs.

For more background info see http://www.leijnen.org/docs/Leijnen.Emerging.Symbols.2008.pdf, or the shorter version of the paper in http://link.springer.com/book/10.1007%2F978-94-007-2336-8#section=1052283&page=1
